Articles.Content:
Hello,

I was wondering if anyone had any tips on how to get KSP to better manage RAM usage. I got so many mods (3.3gb including the expansion) that 16 gigs of RAM is not working out too well in 1.4.4. Sure there is the delete good mods option, but I would like to see if there are other methods before I reduce my enjoyment. Thanks in advance.
Memgraph mod comes to mind. Don't expect miracles though, it just helps with stuttering.
